app_name: Video Editor for Youtube & Video Maker - My Movie
app_detail:
Best video editor for Youtube & Video Star & Free Video Maker &Slideshow Maker with music , easy to make a video&photo slideshow. Use the video editing app to add movie effects to make music video, make movie video with Effects. Splice videos to make montage video and vlog video.

Free No Watermark Video Editor/Photo Video Maker. Everyone is a Video Star!

Video Editing app/movie maker with music, Free Video speed editor/Photo Video Maker. Easy-to-use Video Editor & Video Trimmer. Youtube Video Editor for vloggers and video maker for YouTube to editing video. Your pocket video maker. Easy edit videos to make vlog video/no crop video/music slideshow/movie video. Edit HD video for Youtube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, Messenger, Twitter etc.

Video editing Features of My Movie Maker/Photo Video Maker
Powerful video editing tools:
ğŸ¬ Video Trimmer & Video Cutter & Montage Maker
â— Powerful multiple track timeline video editing.
â— Zoom in or out of the video preview bar with two-finger zoom.
â— Long video trimmer and video cutter. Split video into several video clips.

ğŸ¬ Video Splicer / Video Merger
â— Free video splice for YouTube merge multiple video clips into one video to make pocket video.
â— Merge video clips with 10+ Transitions.
â— Combine videos without losing quality in the movie maker.

ğŸ¬ Photo Slideshow Maker with Transitions
â— With the music slideshow maker to create photo music video with transitions.
â— Merge photos to create photo slideshow with music(PIP Video).
â— Combine picture and video in one video to make photo in video.

ğŸ¬ Video Crop & Video Ratio Change & Video Rotate
â— Zoom in/out to crop video to any size. Use Horizontal and Vertical to create stereoscopic videos.
â— Video Rotate and Flip Editor. Rotate video, or use mirror/flip to change video ratio.
â— Popular video ratios: 1:1,16:9,4:5,9:16, be a video star for YouTube/Instagram.

ğŸ¬ Video Editor with Music
â— 100+ music/songs to choose.Or add your own music on video.
â— Video maker/Vlog editor with song/music&Photo Video Maker. Edit video with vlog music to make vlog video.
â— Support adjust volume of original sound and music.

ğŸ¬ Add Stickers & Text on Video/Slideshow
â— 20+ groups free stickers and funny meme's and gifs/Emojis.
â— DIY stickers: Add your own photos on video. 
â— Add text on video, free animation styles and fonts/colors in video.

ğŸ¬ Video Filter Editor&Video Color Editor&Backgrounds
â— 10+ video filters/movie filters in video maker and 50+ backgrounds.
â— Adjust Brightness, contrast, saturation etc to change video color.

ğŸ¬ FX Video Effects Maker
â— Video editor with effects : glitch, mosaic, mirror etc.
â— 20+ free movie effects filters make your video cool.

ğŸ¬ Video Speed Editor & Video Reverse Editor
â— Free Video speed control with slow motion/fast motion control.
â— With Slowmo video effects to create Fast Motion & Slow Motion video, change the speed of video clip to make video show.
â— Reverse video like a magic movie.

ğŸ¬ Save and Share video
â— Export video in HD 1080p or 720p without losing quality.
â— Easy to share video to YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, Musically, TikTok etc.

My Movie maker is a Free, No Watermark video maker&pro video editor&vlog editor&photo slideshow editor. With video editor/video editing app/photo video editor, cut and trim a long video into video clips, merge several video clips into one video with transition, crop video, change video ratio, rotate video, add blur background.Make slowmo or fastmo video with video speed editor and export HD video without losing quality.

Any suggestions are welcomed! We will always be updating for all users!
charmernewapps@gmail.com
INS: mymovie_app
